program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, ok, M = 1000000007
   integer, allocatable :: a(:)
   character(len=20) :: s_str
   character(len=:), allocatable :: s
   integer :: len_s

   ! Convert ok to string

   s = trim(adjustl(s_str))
   len_s = len_trim(s)

   ! Second part: compute DP and output

   dp = 0
   dp(0,0) = 1

   do i = 1, len_s
      j = i-1 ! current character is s(j+1)
      if (s(j+1) == '0') then
         ! first part
         dp(i,0) = dp(j,0)
         dp(i,1) = dp(j,1)
         ! second part
         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + mod(2*dp(j,1), M), M)
      else

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(j,0) + dp(j,1), M)
         ! second part

         dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1) + mod(2*dp(j,1), M), M)
      end if
      ! mod both

      dp(i,1) = mod(dp(i,1), M)
   end do

contains

   function compute_ok(n, a) result(ok)
      integer, intent(in) :: n, a(n)
      integer :: ok, ng, k
      logical :: possible

      ng = 0
      ok = n

      do while (ok - ng >1)
         k = (ng + ok)/2
         possible = is_possible(k, a, n)
         if (possible) then
            ok = k
         else
            ng = k
         end if
      end do
   end function

   function is_possible(k, a, n) result(res)
      integer, intent(in) :: k, a(n), n
      logical :: res
      integer :: s_count(0:n)
      integer :: current, ai, p, i

      s_count = 0
      current =0
      res = .true.

      do i =1, n
         ai = a(i)
         if (ai <= current) then
            if (k ==1) then
               res = .false.
               return
            end if
            ! Remove all entries with key >= ai
            do p = ai, n
               s_count(p) =0
            end do
            p = ai -1
            do
               if (p <0) then
                  res = .false.
                  return
               end if
               s_count(p) = s_count(p) +1
               if (s_count(p) /=k) exit
               s_count(p) =0
               p = p-1
            end do
         end if
         current = ai
      end do
   end function

end program
